How to Report Issues

  • Check if the issue is already reported on GitHub.
  • Include your Laragon version (e.g., 6.0.0).
  • Describe the steps to reproduce the error.
  • Attach screenshots or log files if possible.

Response Time

We usually respond within 24-48 hours on business days.
